dbAPI.ITable

    Classes in dbAPI that implement ITable

    class  AbstractTable

    class  CacheTable<T extends IRow>
    Represents a database table that saves the data in memory
    class  OnlineTable
    Represents a table that requires a connection
    class  SinglePrimaryKeyCacheTable<T extends IRow>
    Represents a database table that saves the data in memory
